changeSet.author: Alena Galygo
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `booking` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `place_id` INT NOT NULL, `user_id` INT NOT NULL, `time_start` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `time_end` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, `status` ENUM('ACTIVE', 'COMPLETED', 'CANCELED') NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
CREATE TABLE `office` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `address_id` INT NOT NULL, `worktime_start` INT NOT NULL, `worktime_end` INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
CREATE TABLE `place` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `floor_id` INT NOT NULL, `place_number` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `status` ENUM('ACTIVE','INACTIVE') NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
CREATE TABLE `address` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `address` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `country` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
CREATE TABLE `floors` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `office_id` INT NOT NULL, `floor_configuration` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `floor_number` varchar(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE `place_rate` ( `id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `booking_id` INT NOT NULL, `mark_lightning` INT NOT NULL, `mark_air` INT NOT NULL, `mark_volume` INT NOT NULL, `mark_cleaning` INT NOT NULL, `mark_location` INT NOT NULL, `feedback` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
